articles.title: Mumbai beats Beijing to emerge as the new billionaire hub of Asia, Hurun Research's list shows - The Economic Times
articles.description: Mumbai has become Asia's leading billionaire hub, surpassing Beijing for the first time, according to Hurun Research's 2024 Global Rich List. The financial capital of India now has 92 billionaires, edging past Beijing's 91. This places Mumbai third globally i…
articles.content: Mumbai has swiftly emerged as Asia's billionaire hub, surpassing Beijing for the first time, according to Hurun Research's 2024 Global Rich List, TOI has reported. The financial capital of India now … [+2244 chars]

articles.author: KiMi Robinson
articles.title: Who is Jenn Tran? All about the 'Bachelorette's first Asian lead - USA TODAY
articles.description: Jenn Tran, who was on Joey Graziadei's "Bachelor" season, said she's "so honored" to be first Asian bachelorette. Her season will air in 2024.
articles.content:
On the 22nd anniversary of the first episode of "The Bachelor," the franchise announced its first Asian American lead.
After Joey Graziadei's final choice was revealed during Monday night's finale, … [+4722 chars]

articles.author: nutraingredients-asia.com
articles.title: Sarcopenic patients have low levels of NAD+ precursor trigonelline – Nestle-funded study - NutraIngredients-Asia
articles.description: Trigonelline, an alkaloid found in plants and animals, is found to be closely linked to muscle health, with low serum levels reported in seniors suffering from sarcopenia, new findings from a Nestle-funded study have shown.
articles.content:
The research, published in Nature Metabolism, also found that trigonelline is a precursor of nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide (NAD+).
Nicotinamide mononucleotide (NMN) and nicotinamide riboside (NR… [+4749 chars]
